name: chahuadev-anti-mock-cache-scanner
description: Universal Security Scanner - Zero tolerance for Mock/Cache violations. Enforces 'No Mock, No Cache Policy' with advanced pattern detection and real-time analysis.

scripts.test:save: powershell -Command "$timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss'; $logFile = 'test-suites-' + $timestamp + '.log'; npm test 2>&1 | Out-File -FilePath $logFile -Encoding UTF8; Write-Host ' Test results saved to: ' $logFile -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host ' File size: ' ((Get-Item $logFile).Length) ' bytes' -ForegroundColor Yellow"
scripts.test:grandmaster:save: powershell -Command "$timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss'; $logFile = 'grandmaster-test-' + $timestamp + '.log'; npm run test:grandmaster 2>&1 | Out-File -FilePath $logFile -Encoding UTF8; Write-Host ' Grandmaster test results saved to: ' $logFile -ForegroundColor Magenta; Write-Host ' File size: ' ((Get-Item $logFile).Length) ' bytes' -ForegroundColor Yellow"
scripts.test:snapshot:save: powershell -Command "$timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss'; $logFile = 'snapshot-test-' + $timestamp + '.log'; npm run test:snapshot 2>&1 | Out-File -FilePath $logFile -Encoding UTF8; Write-Host ' Snapshot test results saved to: ' $logFile -ForegroundColor Cyan"
scripts.test:fuzz:save: powershell -Command "$timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss'; $logFile = 'fuzz-test-' + $timestamp + '.log'; npm run test:fuzz 2>&1 | Out-File -FilePath $logFile -Encoding UTF8; Write-Host ' Fuzz test results saved to: ' $logFile -ForegroundColor Red"
scripts.test:all-battlefields: npm run test:grandmaster && npm run test:fuzz && npm run test:snapshot && npm run test:coverage-advanced
scripts.test:all-battlefields:save: powershell -Command "$timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss'; $logFile = 'all-battlefields-' + $timestamp + '.log'; npm run test:all-battlefields 2>&1 | Out-File -FilePath $logFile -Encoding UTF8; Write-Host ' All battlefields test results saved to: ' $logFile -ForegroundColor Red; Write-Host ' File size: ' ((Get-Item $logFile).Length) ' bytes' -ForegroundColor Yellow"
